Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at 16th/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 16th, Central Park, Ogden, Pulaski and 16th due to, street blockage near 16th/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via16th, Central Park, Ogden, Pulaski and 16th due to, street blockage near 16th/Hamlin.

Allow extra travel time.
